name: Simon DJ
description:
Simon DJ is a rythm VR game. Play the song following the steps and keep the party going.

We recomend playing this game with a VR headset.

Web -> Use the mouse to look around and click the buttons, click and drag to move sliders and the turntable.

VR -> Needs a VR HMD and at least 1 controller. Use the trigger to activate the buttons and drag to move sliders and turntables.

Made by VARI DEVS ( https://www.varidevs.com/ )

Juan Rinaudo - Programming and game design

Jimena Vallejos - 2D / 3D Artist

Made with Unity

Characters from Simple People by Synth Studios

Music Magic by Six Umbrellas and Techno My EchoOo by KidNNasty

Are assets are used for personal use only.
